title: Some League of Legends music that I did
body:
Hi, my name is Marc or Real Life Shaco

I've been a musician most of my life as well as composed music! I've even made League music for a while. My current project is to recreate the Summoners Call for each nation in the game. Currently here is my song for Freljord (https://soundcloud.com/marcstraight/summoners-call) , my current project is for Ionia! I hope you all like it, let me know what you think :)

Link to my old music thread on the forums.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=916811

replies.body:
OOOooooOOoOoOoo~

A Haiku.

Time, beauty, vision   
Gave me feels of joy, fear, hope  
Super awesome work!

It's amazing the effort behind work like this! Keep it up :)
I never get tired of hearing your work, and it's wonderful to hear you're working on League music again! Not that you have to. XP It's just awesome. As always, I believe in you.
I'm diggin' it dude, wasn't what I expected at all. A nice surprise :)
Solid production man.  That epic feel is hard to capture in a composition.
Thanks man, I definitely dig your stuff to. Draven is my favorite of yours, because... well Draven haha
This was great. Thanks for sharing it!

i remember this stuff from before the game had log in music

so awesome you did all of this stuff
Thank you guys, I'm glad you like it :D
